DOC.brief_summary: This is a survey to help understand the influences related to the decision for Adolescent Idiopathic Scoliosis treatment (observation vs. bracing vs. surgery). The investigator then plans to create a decision aid to help families when making a decision about the treatment choice being presented to them.
DOC.brief_title: Scoliosis Survey to Development Treatment Decision Tool
DOC.criteria: Subject (and/or parent of subject) who has previously been treated for Adolescent Idiopathic Scoliosis (AIS) Age less than or equal to 12 years
